what: Harmonized Appraoch of Cleaning Data in R
title: Harmonized Appraoch of Cleaning Data in R
text: goal cleanR provide functionalists can facilitate data cleaning.

title: Harmonized Appraoch of Cleaning Data in R
text: can install development version cleanR GitHub:

title: Harmonized Appraoch of Cleaning Data in R
text: basic example creating blank logbook can use later save observation issues.
code: library(cleanR)  # create the logbook my_logbook <- logbook()  # inspect the head of the logbook head(my_logbook) #> [1] uuid          question.name issue         feedback      action        #> [6] old.value     new.value     #> <0 rows> (or 0-length row.names)

what: Step 2: Log issues in the logbook
title: Harmonized Appraoch of Cleaning Data in R
text: Now can inspect data use log_issue() write observations data find issues logbook. now can merge check_age data logbook can maintain one logbook can exported end.
code: check_age <- data %>%    filter(ki_age < 15) %>%    log_sheet(question.name = "ki_age",             issue = "respondent is under 15 years old",             action = "delete") # inspect the check_age data head(check_age) #>                                       uuid question.name #> 1 4182fa56-e689-484345-888c8e-e12a90657bf8        ki_age #> 2 cf35eab9-3fa1-464442-b4bdb2-27139e8450da        ki_age #> 3 b67f2895-ca54-40454e-969a91-fcb573d409e8        ki_age #> 4 d091c452-b147-444d48-9a9e9d-be20f47863d1        ki_age #>                              issue feedback action old.value new.value #> 1 respondent is under 15 years old          delete        10           #> 2 respondent is under 15 years old          delete        10           #> 3 respondent is under 15 years old          delete        13           #> 4 respondent is under 15 years old          delete        14 my_logbook <- rbind(my_logbook, check_age)  head(my_logbook) #>                                       uuid question.name #> 1 4182fa56-e689-484345-888c8e-e12a90657bf8        ki_age #> 2 cf35eab9-3fa1-464442-b4bdb2-27139e8450da        ki_age #> 3 b67f2895-ca54-40454e-969a91-fcb573d409e8        ki_age #> 4 d091c452-b147-444d48-9a9e9d-be20f47863d1        ki_age #>                              issue feedback action old.value new.value #> 1 respondent is under 15 years old          delete        10           #> 2 respondent is under 15 years old          delete        10           #> 3 respondent is under 15 years old          delete        13           #> 4 respondent is under 15 years old          delete        14

title: Check other responses — check_other_responses
text: data survey data XML value format other_columns list responses variables, usually prepare list XLSX tool

title: Survey Data — data
text: data frame 100 rows 17 variables: start survey start time end survey end time today date data collection consent survey consent enum_name enumerator name region admin 1 level name district admin 2 level name ki_age respondent age average_monthly_income average household monhtly income belong_idp respondent belong idp camp_structure camp structure camp_structure.camp structure camp_structure.yes_camp yes camp committee camp_structure.yes_committee yes committe exist camp_structure.camp structures camp_structure_other specefication uuid uuid

title: Non-responses — get_na_response_rates
text: data data set XML values format

title: logbook — logbook
text: function create blank logbook used store observations issues

title: logbook — logbook
code: logbook() #> [1] uuid          question.name issue         feedback      action        #> [6] old.value     new.value     #> <0 rows> (or 0-length row.names) if (FALSE) { cleaning_log <- logbook() }

title: log_sheet — log_sheet
text: data survey data XML value format question.name variable name issue provide detail issue action type action required issue

title: log_sheet — log_sheet
code: log_sheet() #> Error in log_sheet(): argument "data" is missing, with no default if (FALSE) { log_sheet(data = data, question.name = "variable", issue = "issue", action = "check") }

title: survey time check — survey_time
text: df data frame XML Values format time_min minimum time complete survey time_max maximum time complete survey
